nodes.documentation:
Constructs the Token contract and gives all of the supply to the address
    that deployed it. The fixed supply is 1 billion tokens with up to 18
    decimal places.
nodes.name: Reparation_Coin
balanceOf
transfer
transferFrom
approve
allowance

nodes.documentation:
Constructs the Token contract and gives all of the supply to the address
    that deployed it. The fixed supply is 1 billion tokens with up to 18
    decimal places.
nodes.name: Reparation_Coin
balanceOf
transfer
transferFrom
approve
allowance

params._owner: Wallet address that tokens can be withdrawn from.
params._spender: Wallet address that tokens can be deposited to.

allowance(address,address).return: The number of tokens allowed to be transferred.

approve(address,uint256).return: True if the approval succeeded, false if not.

params._owner: Wallet address of the returned token balance.

balanceOf(address).return: The balance of tokens in the wallet.

transfer(address,uint256).return: True if the transfer succeeded, false if not.

params._from: Wallet address that tokens are withdrawn from.
params._to: Wallet address that tokens are deposited to.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).return: True if the transfer succeeded, false if not.

Reparation_Coin().notice: Constructs the Token contract and gives all of the supply to the address    that deployed it. The fixed supply is 1 billion tokens with up to 18    decimal places.

allowance(address,address).notice: Gets the number of tokens that a `_owner` has approved for a _spender    to `transferFrom`.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sender allows another wallet to `transferFrom` tokens from their wallet.

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the token balance of any wallet.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from the sender's wallet to the specified `_to` wallet.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens from any wallet to the `_to` wallet. This only works if    the `_from` wallet has already allocated tokens for the caller keyset    using `approve`. From wallet must have sufficient balance to    transfer. Caller must have sufficient allowance to transfer.
